amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments numbered 98, 99, 100, 101, 102, 103, 104, 105, 106, 107, 108, 109, and 110 printed in House Report 114-571. See page D541 of the Congressional Record of May 18, 2016 for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments numbered 98, 99, 100, 101, 102, 103, 104, 105, 106, 107, 108, 109, and 110 printed in House Report 114-571.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A036) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
